title: Countering Domestic Terrorism and Organized Political Violence
summary: The document is a Presidential Memorandum issued on September 25, 2025, titled 'Countering Domestic Terrorism and Organized Political Violence.' It highlights a significant increase in political violence and assassinations in the United States, including the assassination of Charlie Kirk and attempts on other high-profile figures. The memorandum outlines a comprehensive strategy to investigate and disrupt networks engaged in domestic terrorism, including coordinated campaigns of intimidation, radicalization, and violence. Key actions include investigating funding sources, prosecuting related federal crimes, and designating domestic terrorist organizations. The memorandum also directs the Department of Justice and the Department of Homeland Security to prioritize domestic terrorism as a national priority area and allocate funding for law enforcement efforts to combat these threats.
